content:
During the last day, March 17, the enemy fired at Kherson once again, as a result of the attack, one person was injured.

About thisinformsHead of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin.

“Last day, the enemy fired at Berislav, Dnieper, Lviv, Sadovo, Novovorontsovka, Red Lighthouse, Gavrilovka, Novooleksandrivka, Dudchany, Tyaginka, Antonovka, Amber, Poniativka, Kisel, Ivanivka, and Dnieper, Kikon.

According to the head of the Ova, the Russian military kissed in the residential quarters of settlements of the region, resulting in damaged 3 high -rise buildings, 9 private houses, a port infrastructure, a gas gas station, a car service company and a car.

In addition, Alexander Proudin stressed that because of Russian aggression, one person was injured.

As reported by the Armyinform, on the Great Pisarivkapulled off23 Aircraft per day.
title: The enemy continues to attack the civilian population of Kherson region: there is a wounded
description: The chief of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin informs about it. “Last day enemy ...
author: Army Inform
